mapper.insert: insert into chicken( chicken_seq, chicken_kind, chicken_grade, chicken_age, indate ) values ( chicken_seq.nextval, #{chicken_kind}, #{chicken_grade}, #{chicken_age}, sysdate )
insert into Egg( egg_seq, egg_price, egg_grade, chicken_seq ) values ( egg_seq.nextval, #{egg_price}, #{egg_grade}, '0' )
mapper.select: select chicken_seq, chicken_kind, chicken_grade, chicken_age, indate from chicken
select egg_seq, egg_price, egg_grade from egg
